class.name: minestar.production.domain.DelayClass
class.meta: A prototype or template delay used to construct real delays.

property.name: id
property.meta: An automatically generated unique ID value for this type of delay.

many-to-one.name: delayCategory
many-to-one.meta: The delay category that this type of delays fits into. These are values like 'Scheduled Electrical' etc.

property.name: name
property.meta: The common name for this kind of delay.

property.name: description
property.meta: A free form description of this type of delay.

property.name: externalRef
property.meta: A reference for use by MIMS or another external system interfacing with MineStar.

property.name: externalDesc
property.meta: A description for use by MIMS or another external system interfacing with MineStar.

property.name: email
property.meta: An e-mail address where notification should be sent whenever delays of this type occur.

property.name: defaultDuration
property.meta: The default duration for delays of this type.

property.name: acknowledgementReq
property.meta: Indicates whether or not delays of this type require acknowledgement by default.

property.name: availableInField
property.meta: Indicates whether this delay type can be created from the field consoles.

property.name: productionReportingOnly
property.meta: Indicates whether or not delays of this type should, by default, be considered only for the purposes of production reporting. Entities on such delays can still be given assignments.

property.name: engineStopped
property.meta: Indicates whether or not a machine's engine will be switched off when it is delayed for this reason.

property.name: validForRoad
property.meta: Is this kind of delay valid for Roads.

property.name: validForLocation
property.meta: Is this kind of delay valid for Destinations.

property.name: modelUpdateVersion
property.meta: The mine model update version when the delay type was created/modified.

property.name: layerUpdateVersion
property.meta: The layer update version when the delay type was created/modified.

many-to-one.name: delayActivityClass
many-to-one.meta: The optional delay activity class of this delay type

set.name: associations
set.meta: The set of entities that can experience this type of delay.

class.name: minestar.production.domain.DelayClassReference
class.meta: A minimal reference to a DelayClass.
